mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, STATUS, DESCR, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, NAME, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, REMARKS, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, RESULTTYPE, RESULT from DB_PURCHASEHAND where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, STATUS, DESCR, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, NAME, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, REMARKS, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, RESULTTYPE, RESULT from DB_PURCHASEHAND
